EmailTemplate.name: Install Rescheduled
EmailTemplate.subject: Installation Rescheduled for {!FS_Installation__c.FS_Outlet__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Installation Rescheduled Notification:
Please be advised that the installation (Outlet information below) has been Rescheduled.
Outlet: {!FS_Installation__c.FS_Outlet_Information__c}
Click this link https://freestyle.my.salesforce.com to open the FET site. Then click {!FS_Installation__c.Link} to be directed to the specific record referenced above.
